lenders.name: Rex & Dianne
lenders.loan_because: We should always be willing to help others

lenders.name: Tami

lenders.name: Summer

lenders.name: Audree
lenders.loan_because:
1.  Impact - One can impact another's life in a profound way.
2.  Global - One can reach across boarders
3.  Variety - Great to see the variety of opportunities
lenders.occupational_info: I help build buildings by writing contracts, watching budgets, and supporting the people in the field that get all dirty and sweaty.

lenders.name: Cindy

lenders.occupational_info: I used to sit at a desk all day, in front of a computer, and solve problems.  I quit that after 30+ years. Now I do alterations/mending.  I spend a lot of my free  time reading, painting and keeping up with politics.

lenders.name: Sandi
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me in my business and I want to help others to be successful as well....

lenders.name: MARGARET

lenders.occupational_info: I use to work for a bank but now I am enjoying life and my grandchildren.

lenders.name: Carrie
lenders.loan_because: people have been good to me.  I am very blessed and thankful.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach fourth and fifth grade language arts and social studies

lenders.name: jas

lenders.occupational_info: retired.  like to garden flowers - mainly day lilies.

lenders.name: Carlos

lenders.occupational_info: I work in a venture capital firm vesting start up's projects in Spain

lenders.name: Dee

lenders.name: linda

lenders.occupational_info:
AUTOMOBILE INDUSTRAY

We build Nissan automobiles.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to help women in other countries who are trying to make it on their own in this world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office handling bills that need to be paid, preparing letters for my employer, answering the telephone, preparing & handling bank deposits, and in general, doing anything that needs to be done in an office.

lenders.name: richik
lenders.occupational_info: i have a small system integration company of my own.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I want to have a positive impact.
lenders.occupational_info: In 2005, I decided to become an entrepreneur so I could spend more time with my family. My Business provides information and services to the Payments Industry.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: it's a good thing to do. Living in the US with as many luxuries as we have, I think it is our responsibility to help others. The amount of these loans is so small and yet they can change lives. I think about how much money is spent eating out or going to movies and such and if that activity can be skipped a few times, the money can to these loans and it really doesn't present any hardship to me in any way.
lenders.occupational_info: I own and in-home pet sitting business. My customers are generally well off and my service is a luxury.

lenders.name: CMD
lenders.loan_because: I care and I can!

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I can and it makes a difference in the world.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: No matter  where you lay your head at the end of the day, no matter what God you might pray to, we are all brothers and sisters.
lenders.occupational_info: I direct an employment program that helps people with disabilities and other difficulties find work.

lenders.name: Ann & Sandi
lenders.loan_because: Kiva gives us access to those in need and it gives individuals an opportunity to improve their lives.

lenders.name: Joy-Dawn
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great way to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: I can and it is the right thing to do.  It is a hand up.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a director of school programs for children with disabilities.

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: I believe God works many miracles, large and small, and it is our responsibility to help when we can.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: I really want to help others and have the world work better.

lenders.name: Curt
lenders.loan_because: As others have helped me along the way, I want to help boost others to have a better lives.

lenders.name: Sheri
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping those who work to help themselves, those who are not looking for a handout.

lenders.name: KAREN
lenders.loan_because: I am so blessed just to be living in America with all the freedoms and opportunities we enjoy.  Kiva provides a mechanism for helping improve the lives of others around the world.  Thanks, Kiva!
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from the Federal government after 40 years.  I was a Contracting Officer and purchased goods and services for my Federal agency.

lenders.name: Clark
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: retired teacher

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: There is no separation, we are all one.
lenders.occupational_info: I build web sites on the Internet and use them to make money in various ways.

lenders.name: Maura

lenders.occupational_info: My work is similar to a city manager; I operate a Tribal government and Native American Indian Reservation.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I had nothing to do with where I was born and how fortunate I am because of that. I can, however, have something to do with easing the struggles of others who were born into less fortunate circumstances.
lenders.occupational_info: After teaching English in Tanzania for a year, I switched careers and became an ESL teacher in Los Angeles and loved it! I now Manager the Language Center where I taught and feel very fortunate to love the work I do and hope to have the opportunity to teach abroad again in the future.

lenders.name: Joan
lenders.loan_because: Do not wait for leaders; do it alone, person to person. ~ Mother Teresa

lenders.name: Liz and Deb
lenders.loan_because: it makes a difference.

lenders.name: bonnie
lenders.loan_because: So much has been given to me.  Kiva gives me the opportunity to make a difference for one person.    "All I can do is add my light to the sum of light."
lenders.occupational_info: my days are spent at the intersection of medical device design, people, and technology.

lenders.name: Becky
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with legal problems.

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: Kiva helps me make a difference in my own small way.  Person to person giving makes sense to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a teacher for 34 years before retiring.

lenders.name: RUBY

lenders.occupational_info: I train people to become teachers to young children. In other words, I work in an Educational Program.

lenders.name: Michael

You can't beat the drum of what's going wrong and let in what is right! 
                                          - Abraham-Hicks

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have a cow!!

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I want to help

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I should.
lenders.occupational_info: I represent battered women and children with the goal of empowerment and self-sufficiency for abused families.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: Frankly because it is so easy and I think these loans help individuals.  I should be physically out there building homes with Habitat but can't seem to make the time or effort.  This charity assuages my guilt.  I will lend more and urge my business associates to do the same.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I can.  Freely I have received; now it's time to freely give.
lenders.occupational_info: I remind people that Jesus especially cared for the least, the last, and the lost.  I believe we are called do the same today.

lenders.name: Rusyl Lynn
lenders.loan_because: at some point in our life, we will need a helping hand; and by helping one another, we establish a little more sense of well-being.

lenders.name: Penny
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: I was born and I live in the U.S.A., we have so many advantages here that I feel I must help those who have had a harder life.

lenders.name: Linae
lenders.loan_because: I have been extremely blessed to have been loaned money to obtain an education to have my career. I feel it's important to support one another. This is a wonderful opportunity to give to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people how to keep their teeth healthy.

lenders.name: judy
lenders.loan_because: I understand what it is like to start over, need help, and not know how to get it.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach sixth grade students at a public school in Arizona.

lenders.name: Anne

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people
lenders.occupational_info: I love to troubleshoot electro/mechanical problems

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy philanthropy and travel. I am interested in helping people who are honest and hardworking, but were not born in a country of such great opportunity.

lenders.name: Crystal

lenders.name: Ginger
lenders.loan_because: Makes me smile and feels so good.

I have traveled and worked in other countries. I also speak French fluently. 
Kiva is an excellent program.

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed, and I would like to be a blessing to others.

lenders.name: Sharon & Jim
lenders.loan_because: I have been very blessed and I feel I should help people less fortunate that they may have a better life.

lenders.name: Mari
lenders.loan_because: I'm a single mom of three, who works hard to make ends meet, I guess you could say, "I totally understand these women and men trying to make ends meet in their end of the world"...We're all tied together in this world.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: $25 is such a small amount and can do so much good. I waste that amount every week on nothing.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked in a career that was based on helping people help themselves. The Kiva concept continues that.

lenders.name: Allison
lenders.loan_because: It funds a hard working individual who may not have the same resources as I do in my country and I feel that my help can really make a impact.
lenders.occupational_info: I work early in the morning at a business  that answers calls for people who need help with their vehicle and send people to help them. I do this so I can pickup my daughter after school on time.

lenders.name: Amy and Eric
lenders.loan_because: It's good karma.  It makes us feel good to help fellow entrepreneurs make it in their business.

lenders.name: Aunnie

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: It's one way I can help change the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I help families buy and sell their homes.

lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.loan_because: As a former single Parent times were tough for me. But God Blessed me! I like giving to someone that does not have the opportunity to get help as easy as I did as an American. I also feel like these people love there country and I want them to thrive in there villages and as they do they will also help there own economy.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I still sacrifice everyday so I can stay home and help raise my Grandchildren while there Parents work to better there lives.

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: I know what a helping hand can do to change the life of generations. I believe that when given the tools, people will thrive with dignity, self respect and pride.  We all deserve this much.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I can.  Live simply so that others may simply live.
lenders.occupational_info: teacher

lenders.name: Elaine

lenders.occupational_info: I'm a retired school teacher, but continue volunteer  work with troubled youth in Utah. I like travelling, reading, quiltting,  cooking and playing the piano.

lenders.name: KAY

lenders.name: Zack
lenders.loan_because: I think it's important to give back.

lenders.name: Rosemarie
lenders.loan_because: I care and micro finance is wonderful!

lenders.name: Kristy
lenders.loan_because: It's neat to help on individual basis, and for only $25 how can you not help out?

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I want to see Happy Faces
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Investor in Venture that are of my Own and Others.

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of supporting people whose success brings a better life to their families and to others in their local community.  When you are blessed to live in a country with abundant opportunity, it feels good to connect your own resources with individuals all over the world that have their own hopes and dreams for which they are willing to work hard to achieve.  Kiva empowers indiviuals to help individuals in a new and powerful way.
lenders.occupational_info: My work has generally focused around designing instructional or educational materials, but it is also about improving communications in general.  These days I am involved more in freelance writing, and I am semi-retired.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I became involved because I've lived a blessed life with very few hurdles or obstacles to overcome and wish to make life easier for someone less fortunate.  It's my way of thanking the universe and sharing my modest pot of gold with a person who is trying to make a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired from teaching after 30 years and now exploring a career as a photographer.

lenders.name: Franki
lenders.loan_because: It's all about helping people help themselves. These folks don't want or need a handout. They need a chance. I've been given many chances by many different people who believed in me. Who doesn't deserve that?
lenders.occupational_info: As a hospice nurse I take care of terminally ill people, allowing them to die at home with dignity surounded by family and friends.

lenders.name: NANCY

GIVING TO KIVA IS ADDICTIVE !!!!\

lenders.occupational_info:
I taught children who were 12-17 years old,but had the mental age of a 2 to 6 year old.
I work with foreign students,their wives and children and love it.

lenders.name: Adrian

lenders.name: Arlen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves

lenders.name: Butch & Dawg
lenders.loan_because: It helps us put life in perspective. We are so lucky to have the opportunities and the lifestyle we enjoy everyday,  when you see how little it takes to change someone's life, you never take what you have for granted.
lenders.occupational_info: raising capital from institutions (banks, insurance companies, pension funds) for our asset backed lending strategy.

lenders.name: Nicholas

lenders.name: Mary & Ed

lenders.occupational_info: We both used to work in the financial industry.

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for the opportunity to share.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: "Give a man a fish and he'll eat for a day. Teach a man to fish and he'll eat for a lifetime"~Confucius

lenders.name: Laura

lenders.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit horse racing association, we support horse owners & trainers in their times of need- The National HBPA.

lenders.name: marilyn
lenders.loan_because: This seems to be a way that I can make a possitive difference in the world by helping people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I taught kindergarten for 30 years.  I am a mother of three grown children and a grandmother of six.  My husband and I just celebrated 48 years of marriage.

lenders.occupational_info: Retired

lenders.name: Muriel

lenders.occupational_info: I help people get set up to pay bills online, and to send money over the internet.

lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur and I want to support other entrepreneurs in their endeavors.

lenders.name: Ronni
lenders.loan_because: I found this website by coincident. I think it’s a very good project and therefore I want to support it.
lenders.occupational_info: Bachelor in Social Education degree. Working in a kindergarten.

lenders.name: Shelley
lenders.loan_because: No matter where you are in your life, you deserve to know there are people out there that want to help, believe and be there for each other to bring a little happiness to another’s life....

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I feel fortunate that I now have the funds to allow me to participate in Kiva and help others....and I love what this program can do to improve the life of others

lenders.name: Brenda
lenders.loan_because: I believe hard working people should be given the opportunity to succeed.

lenders.name: Aaron, Yosmar & Stella
lenders.loan_because: The opportunity for our family to grow with the global community, learning from others, and improving our lives.
lenders.occupational_info: As parents to Stella our work is to provide her with a safe, nurturing environment.  My work in nursing is to deliver high technology medicine with a human touch.

lenders.name: Jacqueline
lenders.loan_because: Because it is important to lend a hand and give support.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with my husband in his businesss

lenders.name: Olle
lenders.loan_because: It's the humane thing to do.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: we should accept help when we need it and give help when we can.

lenders.name: "Coop"
lenders.loan_because: We can create the world we dream about lending through KIVA.
lenders.occupational_info: Assisting my fellow human beings without humbling them or causing them to become dependent.  Special emphasis on young families.

lenders.name: melody
lenders.loan_because: I have three beautiful children who are happy and well fed and who are in school.  Every parent should feel as happy as me.  I am blessed to have a chance to help another person  help themselves and their families!

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I feel very fortunate and this is a great way to help others.  It encourages people that work hard and helps them and their families to get ahead.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell computers to businesses over the phone.  I'm in Sales.

lenders.name: jcsaidso
lenders.loan_because: Jesus Christ said so
lenders.occupational_info: fulfilling

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: gifts tend to be less effective.

lenders.name: Marcia
lenders.loan_because: because I am so blessed that I could...
lenders.occupational_info: I run a small family owned hotel (not my family!)- only 19 rooms- I take reservations, manage costs, schedule housekeeping and maintenance jobs and hours and try to be a good witness for Christ in the process.

lenders.name: Henrik
lenders.loan_because: I can; and everybody deserves a chance
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a practice within a global consulting company

lenders.name: Helen
lenders.loan_because: Because helping other people become self sufficient by their own work is more useful than giving handouts
lenders.occupational_info: I help people account for the money they spend and receive in their business

lenders.name: L.J.
lenders.loan_because: Someone helped me when I needed it and now it's time to give back.

lenders.name: jenn
lenders.loan_because: I can!

lenders.name: Sheilah
lenders.loan_because: God blesses me every day,  and I want to pass it on to other women.
lenders.occupational_info: For many years I worked in an office.  Now I "work" by occasionally helping a woman in childbirth.  I also volunteer as an  animal rescuer.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others to help themselves. I feel fortunate to live where I live and have access to resources.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work with people. I work as a clinician in my own business. I also work in a clinic that is not for profit. I also work as an educator.
I am also involved in a local coffee shop where I put my other business hat on.

lenders.name: Melissa and Chris
lenders.loan_because: A small amount of money can make a giant difference.

lenders.name: Coralie and Denny
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the empowerment of owning and growing your own business.  I am happy to be able to help other people realize their dreams.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I have been helped by so many people in my life. This is one way to return the help.
lenders.occupational_info: I restore older homes and build new homes for people.

lenders.name: Outdoor Talk - Members
lenders.loan_because: It's important to help other people, and who better to offer help than somoone who is at least putting forth a little extra effort.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of outdoor enthusiasts who enjoy talking over the internet about various topics, usually outdoor sports and activities such as hiking, fishing, and hunting among numerous other outdoor prusuits.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: we can all make a difference.

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a graduate student and research assistant in an oceanography laboratory in Alaska.  I am studying the natural variability of dissolved nutrients in the Gulf of Alaska ecosystem.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: This is one of the best ways I've found to help.. through KIVA.

lenders.name: Teresa
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: Roberta
lenders.loan_because: I am inspired by the individuals requesting loans and their stories. They show determination, creativity, and initiative in meeting their day to day needs for themselves and their families. How wonderful to be involved in these projrcts!
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a Hospice program. We take care of very sick people of all ages who are dying from their illness. We support their families after their death to help them cope with the death and find new meaning in their lives.

lenders.name: Darrell
lenders.loan_because: I love to see business grow and I think it is awesome to help other people. This seems to be such an incredible cause to help the world economy.
lenders.occupational_info: Teacher/coach/real estate investor

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I want to be a catalyst for change and I believe in helping those who help themselves.

lenders.name: Guy
lenders.loan_because: I think - in many cases - it can be a better and more sustainable way to help people than donating money

lenders.name: Ida
lenders.loan_because: I believe that hard-working people need a chance to make money.  Kiva gives many entrepreneurs the opportunity to build a business and help create a sustainable economy for their countries. Microloans are an important way to share our good fortune as citizens of the world.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: it's such an easy way to help others realize their dream.  There's no reason not to do it!
lenders.occupational_info: I help record and organize the financial records of a coffee company.

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: to help others reach their goals
lenders.occupational_info: stressful and fun, all at the same time.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs that chance to make their life better.  I believe all children should have the right to education, they do not choose their own circumstances.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell their homes, one of the most important transactions of their lives!

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I want to help hardworking people around the world.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: because I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a nurse, traveling in rural areas to patients' homes to assist them with their medical conditions.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I feel good about doing something to help.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.loan_because: we all have the power to make a difference in this world...
lenders.occupational_info: I am very popular amongst friends and family. I make French pastries and all different kinds of desserts and sweets and love doing it.

lenders.name: Michele
lenders.loan_because: I feel that everyone deserves to live a good life.  Living in the USA I have many opportunities available to me.  I want others to be able to have the opportunity to change their life and pursue their dream of running a successful business.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children who are abused or neglected by their parents or guardians.  I provide the children and their parents or guardians with referrals to services needed in order for the family to remain together or to be reunited.

lenders.name: Bob Beckett & Family
lenders.loan_because: We want to directly assist people who want to establish and grow their own business.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because:
The entrepreneurs on Kiva can really use any help they can get to start going. They are not begging, but instead try and work hard to build up something good for themselves and others around them. I really admire this.

Kiva is truly a great initiative and I am happy to participate!
lenders.occupational_info: I make computer systems work.

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: To make the world a better place

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I know that it is difficult to start and run your own business.  9 years ago I started my own business in a male dominated industry and it is successful.  I have put in a lot of hard work and dedication and I couldn't have done it without the support of my husband and family.  I want to give others an opportunity to do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: Home remodeling and decorating.

lenders.name: Vickie
lenders.loan_because: I'm blessed.
lenders.occupational_info: Secretary to people needing government assistance.

lenders.name: Tonya
lenders.loan_because: "Everyone" is important.
lenders.occupational_info: Mother of two. Full time college student. Miltary spouse.

lenders.name: Russ Schoen
lenders.loan_because: I find it is rewarding to provide resources that may help people improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: helping teams go from "blamestorming to brainstorming". Innovation training and facilitation. Training people to see and create new possibilities. University Instructor at the International Center for Studies in Creativity.  www.buffalostate.edu/creativity

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: the Lord has blessed me, and I want to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the president of an engineering company.

lenders.name: john
lenders.loan_because: i would like to help others get a start  so they can live their dream
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired and help people in the area that I live.  I also volunteer in  ministry  to tell people about Jesus.

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: This is such a great way to lend a hand up to someone in need, and the results they achieve with such modest amounts is truly remarkable.

lenders.name: Carl
lenders.loan_because: I feel very fortunate to be able to provide for my family and want to help others develop their businesses so that they can provide a better life for their families.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I want to practice generosity
lenders.occupational_info: I bring joy, inspiration, courage, spiritual and financial success to thousands and thousands of people

lenders.name: Helene
lenders.loan_because: I had to start over late in life and it was tough.  Now it is possible, in  this way, to extend a hand to others who are  having a rough go of it -especially where help and resources  are limited. I love Kiva  - it makes helping out very satisfying.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a small music business and also play the cello.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: I can. The micro economy is so important in developing countries, especially Central and South America. Buena Suerte con su empresa!
lenders.occupational_info: Help educators integrate technology into teaching and learning, as well as other aspects of using technology in education.

lenders.name: Shirley
lenders.loan_because: I support the idea of people pooling their money to help others via small loans as demonstrated by the Credit Unions around the world.    This is a very dynamic application of this concept and everyone benefits.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a Director of a local Credit Union for over 20 years and I believe in the 'helping hand' approach of making small loans to help others improve their lives.

lenders.name: Elise
lenders.loan_because: I really want to change people's lives!

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: I have been given so much and I would like to give others the opportunity to be self sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am responsible for hiring the staff
that take care of our patients in one the one the best hospitals in the world-
UCLA (University of California Los Angeles)

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: Always been aware of the imbalance MY typical American lifestyle causes those less fortunate across the globe, but "Confessions of an Economic Hit Man" really opened my eyes.  Kiva allows me some ability to make a small difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Among other things I build sets and scenery for theaters, opera, musical, dance and other performing arts events.

lenders.name: ML Brittany John
lenders.loan_because: Our family helps girls and women around the world start and grow their own businesses so that they can better support and educate their families.
lenders.occupational_info:
Mary Lynn helps the leaders of companies run their businesses better.

Brittany is in 9th grade.

John is a banker.

lenders.name: zakk, terri, josh, yo
lenders.loan_because:
we're a family with four different businesses that we are running.
we know that helping each other out matters.
lenders.occupational_info: terri has a healing art business, josh is a musician, yo and zakk run a computer graphics/tutorial business.

lenders.name: Vicki
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women have their dreams!
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a pharmaceutical company that is developing new medicines for specific diseases.

lenders.name: Arne Vagn
lenders.loan_because: I want to help out

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference and teach my daughter the gift of giving.
lenders.occupational_info: I am director of a radiology department in a local hospital.

lenders.name: Ken, Vicky, Gabby, Emily
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed us with abundance so that we may be a blessing to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in service to my community by caring for the sick, the injured, and the displaced through medical care and preservation of property and assets.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people who are trying to help themselves.  Loans give people dignity and teach them responsibility.  Go Kiva!

lenders.name: Jorge
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people that are prepared to take initiative.

lenders.name: Patti
lenders.loan_because: As an artist and a small business owner, it feels good to know I can make a difference in the lives of other entrepreneurs working hard to follow their dreams.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I recently visited Nepal and realized more than ever how much our loans can do to help people in need.

lenders.name: Humphrey & Mary
lenders.loan_because:
I have travelled the hard road and life has been good to me.
I'm greatful to Kiva for giving me this opportunity to enpower others to attain a better life for themselves and their children

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: This is a wonderful way to help people all over the world achieve their dreams of better lives.  I especially like knowing exactly who will benefit from my loans.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach young children ages 8 - 11, and in my spare time I make quilts to keep people warm at night.  I also volunteer with AFS Intercultrual Programs, bringing teenagers from all over the world to the USA to live with families and go to high school for one year.

lenders.name: Gail
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate in my life and want to share with others
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office during the day and recharge my spirit outdoors in the evenings and weekends.

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: My mother always taught me that the blessings you give out to others will come back to you.  My life is so blessed and I am so grateful to be able to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm in my second career (after teaching 30 years) as an attorney specializing in helping disabled people get Social Security disability benefits.

lenders.name: Jane & Bob
lenders.loan_because: I have had a helping hand in my life and feel it is time to pass it on.
lenders.occupational_info:
We take care of our grandchildren.
Work on our cars and take care of our home.

lenders.name: Courtney
lenders.loan_because: I believe anyone willing to work should get a chance to succeed in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a mom - that's the same no matter where you are!

lenders.name: Cisneros Family
lenders.loan_because: It is a simple, yet powerful way in which our family can make a difference :)

lenders.name: craig
lenders.occupational_info: auto repair

lenders.name: Ricardo
lenders.loan_because: As an American-Colombian entrepreneur, I identify not only with entrepreneurs around the globe and with the responsibility to help the latino community but also with the idea that a great microlending program is one of the most efficient ways to promote economic development around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I started a tech support company 5 years ago. We support all the computer equipment of 200 businesses in NY.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: We need to make a difference where we can.

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: I believe that people value what they pay for and small loans given at reasonable rates encourage entrepreneurship and self reliance.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the business affairs of a small non-profit community owned ski area in New Mexico

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I think everyone is entitled to make their own way in the world and sometimes they may need a little help - I and other Kiva lenders are that little help that people need.

lenders.name: Stacy
lenders.loan_because: I can.  I just can't think of a reason to not loan.  I am lucky that my husband and I can afford a home and have jobs that support us and our daughter.  We are both in public service and don't have a large amount of expendable income but we can help and will teach our daughter to do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in public transportation in Upstate New York.

lenders.name: Barb
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of people and with a hand up, people can thrive and care for their family.  Thanks, Kiva for making this so easy.

lenders.name: Eileen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone  provide for them self and their family.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I dont have much, but others have given a helping hand at times when I have truly had need.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired police officer, who works with small movies doing police advice, And as an ordained minister do weddings...

lenders.name: barbara and ken
lenders.loan_because: We love seeing people start their own businesses and become successful.

lenders.name: Brent
lenders.loan_because: I heard about KIVA on NPR and deeply appreciate its global reach and spirit. It's a true miracle that someone like me can contribute with such ease to the truly needy and wonderful people who receive these loans and touch so many lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a freelancer doing crafts and home design projects for magazines.

lenders.name: Amena
lenders.loan_because: I want to be part of something that benefits other people.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a social worker

lenders.name: Shirley & Doug
lenders.loan_because: My husband and I are touched daily reading about those around us near and far away that live in difficult times.  We wish for peace in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Shirley is a retired Office Manager and Doug is a self published writer.

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: There was a time many many years ago when I was newly divorced and really struggling financially.  Someone anonymously left me several sacks of groceries when I really needed it.  There was a note that said someone had helped this person once, and asked that whenever I had opportunity in my life to help others, would I?  I help now because though I'm not rich, I have more than my basic needs met, and I want  to share where I can so that others can have their needs met.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a successful real estate management company in their Information Technology department.

lenders.name: Kristina
lenders.loan_because: it makes the world a better place.

lenders.name: Deanne
lenders.loan_because: I want to be a part of someone's dream
lenders.occupational_info: I negotiate and manage business

lenders.name: John and Renee
lenders.loan_because: Loans to help people help themselves, and teach them about managing money to provide a better life for their families - a simple but so effective solution at such a small cost.  It makes sense to us.

lenders.name: ralph
lenders.loan_because: I believe in encouraging entrepreneurship, and allowing fair opportunities for everyone. Someone helped me get started once, and I want to give that back!
lenders.occupational_info: I manufacture and distribute sports wear

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: One day I might need help and its nice to know we still live in a world where people still care about the little guy.   We may be the only hope some of these people have and they deserve a chance. It is our duty to give back to the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the county school board, in the district office print shop

lenders.name: keith
lenders.loan_because: why not
lenders.occupational_info: Install telephones and computers.

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life and want to help others.

lenders.name: Shelley
lenders.loan_because: It's the most powerful use of my money I've found.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist start-up and existing small businesses in creating and implementing strategy.

lenders.name: Pablo
lenders.loan_because: My friend Christina drug me into it.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: Restructuring your life for the better is not something unfamiliar to me... it takes strength, dedication & belief in yourself to move forward. I have no hesitation in helping these motivated people start their journeys & see their goals accomplished.
lenders.occupational_info: laid off 3 yrs ago with few employment opportunities to use my 30+ yrs of professional experience & skills due to the current U.S. economy

lenders.name: Sydney
lenders.loan_because: I have been in the position where a small amount of money would have been tremendously helpful to me, and it is good to be able to loan to others now.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a professional oil painter.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: I want to help
lenders.occupational_info: I stay at home with my kids and my dogs. I try to create the best environment for their well being.

lenders.name: Marcia
lenders.loan_because: Because anyone who can, should. Not to mention it feels good.   :)
lenders.occupational_info: I co-own a business that designs custom web technologies.

lenders.name: mary
lenders.loan_because: I want to cotinue helping others to help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I worked as a nursing sister in a very busy outpatients dept in a glasgow hospital

lenders.name: Claudia
lenders.loan_because: Feels good to do a good deed. No matter how small.

lenders.name: juan carlos
lenders.loan_because: Iam a student and i want to open my own company in tourism
lenders.occupational_info: I want to work to myself becase i am studing tourism in Cusco Peru and the owner of the companies here pay few for too much work for that i want my own company.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: I believe in encouraging hard working individuals to pursue their dreams and to provide for their families. Kiva seems to be a good organization!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm semi retired and now able  to pursue my dream to be a  nature photographer. I work hard to improve my skills and enjoy the process very much. I have some of my work at a local gallery, and show on my website.

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: I started my business with a very small investment and I want to encourage anyone who has the courage to start his own enterprise.
lenders.occupational_info: I write computer programs for small businesses, many of which are just getting started.

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping those who are motivated to help themselves.
